about_the_game: Protect your crops with a special touch! The Scarecrow is the perfect accessory to ensure that your harvests are always safe from pests and other unwanted invaders. Besides its practical function, this scarecrow adds extra charm to your farm, making it even more unique and personalized. Be the pride of your neighbors with this essential new item for any virtual farmer!
detailed_description: Protect your crops with a special touch! The Scarecrow is the perfect accessory to ensure that your harvests are always safe from pests and other unwanted invaders. Besides its practical function, this scarecrow adds extra charm to your farm, making it even more unique and personalized. Be the pride of your neighbors with this essential new item for any virtual farmer!

short_description: Protect your crops in style! Add a themed scarecrow that keeps pests away and personalizes your farm.

English, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
